title: Coming right up: one serving of Now & Next for August 🔥 Watch the full episode for more!

author: Xbox
description:
Check out your June episode of Now & Next! Featuring the latest games that you can play now with Game Pass, plus a look forward at what's coming next! This episode also features new content updates, member benefits, and more!

0:00 INTRODUCTION

00:19 BREAKING NEWS
Gears of War: Reloaded

0:27 IN CASE YOU MISSED IT
VOID/BREAKER
The Rogue Prince of Persia

0:40 NOW WITH GAME PASS
Assassin's Creed Mirage
Farming Simulator 25
Heretic + Hexen
Herdling
9 Kings
Blacksmith Master
Persona 4 Golden

01:35 CONTENT UPDATES
Sea of Thieves
Senua's Saga: Hellblade II

01:50 MEMBER BENEFITS
War Thunder
Enlisted

02:08 NEXT WITH GAME PASS
Dragon Age: The Veilguard

02:21 BUY IT, STREAM IT
Gradius Origins
Everspace
Don't Starve Giant Edition
Mafia: The Old Country

title: August Now & Next | What's now and what's next with Game Pass?

author: Xbox
description:
Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE launches on Xbox PC on November 17, 2025.

Pre-order the Deluxe Edition for 3-day early access and exclusive bonus items!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/solo-leveling-arise-overdrive/9mvhcq7cjx01

Based on the hit webtoon, Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE brings the ultimate action RPG to Xbox with dynamic combat, parries, explosive skill combos, and real-time 4-player co-op!

author: Xbox
description:
Introducing...No Man's Sky VOYAGERS (Update 6.0)

Create your own colossal, fully furnished, completely bespoke Corvette-class starship in No Man's Sky VOYAGERS. Assemble a huge, completely custom starship, and invite your friends on board. Introducing habitable, multi-crew starships with hundreds of ship modules in a variety of sci-fi aesthetics - and more!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/no-mans-sky/bqvqtl3pch05#activetab=pivot:overviewtab
